verses.verse: הֶן־ <S%H2005><s%> Behold כֹּ֭ל <S%H3605><s%> all רָאֲתָ֣ה <S%H7200><s%> hath seen עֵינִ֑י <S%H5869><s%> Lo mine eye שָֽׁמְעָ֥ה <S%H8085><s%> hath heard אָ֝זְנִ֗י <S%H241><s%> all [this] mine ear וַתָּ֥בֶן <S%H995><s%> and understood לָֽהּ׃

כְּֽ֭דַעְתְּכֶם <S%H1847><s%> What ye know יָדַ֣עְתִּי <S%H3045><s%> [the same] do I know גַם־ <S%H1571><s%> also אָ֑נִי <S%H589><s%> I לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> I am not נֹפֵ֖ל <S%H5307><s%> also I [am] not inferior אָנֹכִ֣י <S%H595><s%> I מִכֶּֽם׃ <S%H4480><s%> at

אוּלָ֗ם <S%H199><s%> Surely אֲ֭נִי <S%H589><s%> I אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to שַׁדַּ֣י <S%H7706><s%> to the Almighty אֲדַבֵּ֑ר <S%H1696><s%> I would speak וְהוֹכֵ֖חַ <S%H3198><s%> to reason אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> with אֵ֣ל <S%H410><s%> with God אֶחְפָּֽץ׃ <S%H2654><s%> and I desire

וְֽאוּלָ֗ם <S%H199><s%> But אַתֶּ֥ם <S%H859><s%> you טֹֽפְלֵי־ <S%H2950><s%> ye [are] forgers שָׁ֑קֶר <S%H8267><s%> of lies רֹפְאֵ֖י <S%H7495><s%> ye [are] all physicians אֱלִ֣ל <S%H457><s%> of no value כֻּלְּכֶֽם׃ <S%H3605><s%> are all

מִֽי־ <S%H4310><s%> O יִ֭תֵּן <S%H5414><s%> O that הַחֲרֵ֣שׁ <S%H2790><s%> ye would altogether תַּחֲרִישׁ֑וּן <S%H2790><s%> hold your peace וּתְהִ֖י <S%H1961><s%> become לָכֶ֣ם לְחָכְמָֽה׃ <S%H2451><s%> and it should be your wisdom

שִׁמְעוּ־ <S%H8085><s%> Hear נָ֥א <S%H4994><s%> Please תוֹכַחְתִּ֑י <S%H8433><s%> now my reasoning וְרִב֖וֹת <S%H7379><s%> to the pleadings שְׂפָתַ֣י <S%H8193><s%> of my lips הַקְשִֽׁיבוּ׃ <S%H7181><s%> and hearken
הַ֭לְאֵל <S%H410><s%> God תְּדַבְּר֣וּ <S%H1696><s%> Will ye speak עַוְלָ֑ה <S%H5766><s%> wickedly וְ֝ל֗וֹ תְּֽדַבְּר֥וּ <S%H1696><s%> and speak רְמִיָּֽה׃ <S%H7423><s%> deceitfully
הֲפָנָ֥יו <S%H6440><s%> accept תִּשָּׂא֑וּן <S%H5375><s%> Will ye accept אִם־ <S%H518><s%> lo לָאֵ֥ל <S%H410><s%> God תְּרִיבֽוּן׃ <S%H7378><s%> contend

הֲ֭טוֹב <S%H2896><s%> will it be well כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> when יַחְקֹ֣ר <S%H2713><s%> that he should search you out אֶתְכֶ֑ם <S%H853><s%> אִם־ <S%H518><s%> Or כְּהָתֵ֥ל <S%H2048><s%> mocketh בֶּ֝אֱנ֗וֹשׁ <S%H376><s%> another תְּהָתֵ֥לּוּ <S%H2048><s%> another do ye [so] mock בֽוֹ׃

הוֹכֵ֣חַ <S%H3198><s%> He will surely יוֹכִ֣יחַ <S%H3198><s%> reprove אֶתְכֶ֑ם <S%H853><s%> אִם־ <S%H518><s%> If בַּ֝סֵּ֗תֶר <S%H5643><s%> you if ye do secretly פָּנִ֥ים <S%H6440><s%> persons תִּשָּׂאֽוּן׃ <S%H5375><s%> accept

הֲלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> will not שְׂ֭אֵתוֹ <S%H7613><s%> Shall not his excellency תְּבַעֵ֣ת <S%H1204><s%> make you afraid אֶתְכֶ֑ם <S%H853><s%> וּ֝פַחְדּ֗וֹ <S%H6343><s%> ? and his dread יִפֹּ֥ל <S%H5307><s%> fall עֲלֵיכֶֽם׃ <S%H5921><s%> and

זִֽ֭כְרֹנֵיכֶם <S%H2146><s%> Your remembrances מִשְׁלֵי־ <S%H4911><s%> be like אֵ֑פֶר <S%H665><s%> unto ashes לְגַבֵּי־ <S%H1354><s%> your bodies חֹ֝֗מֶר <S%H2563><s%> of clay גַּבֵּיכֶֽם׃ <S%H1354><s%> to bodies

הַחֲרִ֣ישׁוּ <S%H2790><s%> Hold your peace מִ֭מֶּנִּי <S%H4480><s%> before וַאֲדַבְּרָה־ <S%H1696><s%> let me alone that I may speak אָ֑נִי <S%H589><s%> Then וְיַעֲבֹ֖ר <S%H5674><s%> and let come עָלַ֣י <S%H5921><s%> on מָֽה׃ <S%H4100><s%> what

עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and מָ֤ה ׀ <S%H4100><s%> I אֶשָּׂ֣א <S%H5375><s%> Wherefore do I take בְשָׂרִ֣י <S%H1320><s%> my flesh בְשִׁנָּ֑י <S%H8127><s%> in my teeth וְ֝נַפְשִׁ֗י <S%H5315><s%> my life אָשִׂ֥ים <S%H7760><s%> and put בְּכַפִּֽי׃ <S%H3709><s%> branch

הֵ֣ן <S%H2005><s%> Though יִ֭קְטְלֵנִי <S%H6991><s%> he slay [לֹא כ] (לֹ֣ו <S%H3808><s%> not ק) אֲיַחֵ֑ל <S%H3176><s%> me yet will I trust אַךְ־ <S%H389><s%> Nevertheless דְּ֝רָכַ֗י <S%H1870><s%> mine own ways אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about פָּנָ֥יו <S%H6440><s%> before אוֹכִֽיחַ׃ <S%H3198><s%> in him but I will maintain גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> again הוּא־ <S%H1931><s%> he

לִ֥י לִֽישׁוּעָ֑ה <S%H3444><s%> He also [shall be] my salvation כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> for לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> before לְ֝פָנָ֗יו <S%H6440><s%> before חָנֵ֥ף <S%H2611><s%> for an hypocrite יָבֽוֹא׃ <S%H935><s%> shall not come
שִׁמְע֣וּ <S%H8085><s%> Hear שָׁ֭מוֹעַ <S%H8085><s%> diligently מִלָּתִ֑י <S%H4405><s%> my speech וְ֝אַֽחֲוָתִ֗י <S%H262><s%> and my declaration בְּאָזְנֵיכֶֽם׃ <S%H241><s%> with your ears

הִנֵּה־ <S%H2009><s%> Behold נָ֭א <S%H4994><s%> now עָרַ֣כְתִּי <S%H6186><s%> Behold now I have ordered מִשְׁפָּ֑ט <S%H4941><s%> [my] cause יָ֝דַ֗עְתִּי <S%H3045><s%> I know כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> that אֲנִ֥י <S%H589><s%> I אֶצְדָּֽק׃ <S%H6663><s%> that I shall be justified

מִי־ <S%H4310><s%> Who ה֭וּא <S%H1931><s%> he יָרִ֣יב <S%H7378><s%> Who [is] he [that] will plead עִמָּדִ֑י <S%H5978><s%> against כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> For עַתָּ֖ה <S%H6258><s%> then אַחֲרִ֣ישׁ <S%H2790><s%> with me? for now if I hold my tongue וְאֶגְוָֽע׃ <S%H1478><s%> I shall give up the ghost

אַךְ־ <S%H389><s%> Only שְׁ֭תַּיִם <S%H8147><s%> not two אַל־ <S%H410><s%> God תַּ֣עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> Only do עִמָּדִ֑י <S%H5978><s%> to me אָ֥ז <S%H227><s%> Then מִ֝פָּנֶ֗יךָ <S%H6440><s%> myself from thee לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> I will not אֶסָּתֵֽר׃ <S%H5641><s%> [things] unto me then will I not hide

כַּ֭פְּךָ <S%H3709><s%> thine hand מֵעָלַ֣י <S%H5921><s%> and הַרְחַ֑ק <S%H7368><s%> far וְ֝אֵ֥מָתְךָ֗ <S%H367><s%> from me and let not thy dread אַֽל־ <S%H408><s%> nay תְּבַעֲתַֽנִּי׃ <S%H1204><s%> make me afraid

וּ֭קְרָא <S%H7121><s%> Then call וְאָנֹכִ֣י <S%H595><s%> and I אֶֽעֱנֶ֑ה <S%H6030><s%> thou and I will answer אֽוֹ־ <S%H176><s%> Or אֲ֝דַבֵּ֗ר <S%H1696><s%> or let me speak וַהֲשִׁיבֵֽנִי׃ <S%H7725><s%> and answer

כַּמָּ֣ה <S%H4100><s%> How לִ֭י עֲוֹנ֣וֹת <S%H5771><s%> How many [are] mine iniquities וְחַטָּא֑וֹת <S%H2403><s%> and my sin פִּֽשְׁעִ֥י <S%H6588><s%> my transgression וְ֝חַטָּאתִ֗י <S%H2403><s%> and my sin הֹדִיעֵֽנִי׃ <S%H3045><s%> known
לָֽמָּה־ <S%H4100><s%> Why פָנֶ֥יךָ <S%H6440><s%> thou thy face תַסְתִּ֑יר <S%H5641><s%> Wherefore hidest וְתַחְשְׁבֵ֖נִי <S%H2803><s%> and holdest לְאוֹיֵ֣ב <S%H341><s%> me for thine enemy לָֽךְ׃

הֶעָלֶ֣ה <S%H5929><s%> a leaf נִדָּ֣ף <S%H5086><s%> driven to and fro תַּעֲר֑וֹץ <S%H6206><s%> Wilt thou break וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> קַ֖שׁ <S%H7179><s%> stubble יָבֵ֣שׁ <S%H3002><s%> the dry תִּרְדֹּֽף׃ <S%H7291><s%> ? and wilt thou pursue

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for תִכְתֹּ֣ב <S%H3789><s%> For thou writest עָלַ֣י <S%H5921><s%> against מְרֹר֑וֹת <S%H4846><s%> bitter things וְ֝תוֹרִישֵׁ֗נִי <S%H3423><s%> against me and makest me to possess עֲוֹנ֥וֹת <S%H5771><s%> the iniquities נְעוּרָֽי׃ <S%H5271><s%> of my youth

וְתָ֘שֵׂ֤ם <S%H7760><s%> Thou puttest בַּסַּ֨ד ׀ <S%H5465><s%> also in the stocks רַגְלַ֗י <S%H7272><s%> my feet וְתִשְׁמ֥וֹר <S%H8104><s%> and lookest narrowly כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all אָרְחוֹתָ֑י <S%H734><s%> unto all my paths עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> for שָׁרְשֵׁ֥י <S%H8328><s%> upon the heels רַ֝גְלַ֗י <S%H7272><s%> of my feet תִּתְחַקֶּֽה׃ <S%H2707><s%> thou settest a print

וְ֭הוּא <S%H1931><s%> he כְּרָקָ֣ב <S%H7538><s%> And he as a rotten thing יִבְלֶ֑ה <S%H1086><s%> consumeth כְּ֝בֶ֗גֶד <S%H899><s%> as a garment אֲכָ֣לוֹ <S%H398><s%> eaten עָֽשׁ׃ <S%H6211><s%> that is moth
